sentences.english: The analysis conduces to smooth expression in English-Chinese translation.
sentences.chinese: 对比分析有助于实现英汉互译之目的。

sentences.english: The system of theory of interpret of French-Chinese each other that exploration builds Chinese characteristic.
sentences.chinese: 探索建立中国特色的法汉互译理论体系。

sentences.english: The external or internal interference interrupts my interpretation at short intervals.
sentences.chinese: 内部和外部干涉以很短的间隔打扰我汉文英语互译。

sentences.english: So, translation should undergo transformation between hypotaxis and parataxis .
sentences.chinese: 英汉互译时，要进行形合与意合的转换。

sentences.english: She is also in charge of editing most translation works for the company.
sentences.chinese: 负责天语公司大部分中英互译稿件的终稿审定。

sentences.english: Understanding correctly this tendency has a practical significance to E/C translating mutually.
sentences.chinese: 正确认识这种倾向对于英汉互译有很大的实践意义。

sentences.english: Before supper, she can pass my test and translate these sentences very well.
sentences.chinese: 她可以很好的将这些句子进行中英文互译了。

definition: simultaneous interpretation (abbr. for 同聲傳譯|同声传译[tong2 sheng1 chuan2 yi4])
dictionary/also written 辭典|辞典[ci2 dian3]/CL:部[bu4],本[ben3]
to transliterate/to transcribe/to transfer words onto a surface by direct contact (as with a decal)
